source.sqlReaderQuery:
--TRUNCATE TABLE stg.cinema_tickets;  --c)	Stage table should be truncated before population

SELECT
  coalesce(last_transaction_date, '1970-01-01') as last_target_transaction_date
FROM (
  SELECT 
    MAX(transactiondate) as last_transaction_date
  FROM [dbo].[tCinemaTickets]
  ) ds;

SELECT
  coalesce(last_transaction_date, '9999-12-31') as last_source_transaction_date
FROM (
  SELECT 
    MAX(TransactionDt) as last_transaction_date
  FROM dbo.Tickets
  ) ds;

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
  CinemaCode, CinemaName, MovieId, TicketCount, TicketPrice, TransactionId, TransactionDt
FROM dbo.Tickets
WHERE TransactionDt >  '@{activity('ACT_GEN_LKP_TargetGetLastLoadDate').output.firstRow.last_target_transaction_date}' --last_target_transaction_date
  AND TransactionDt <= '@{activity('ACT_GEN_LKP_SourceGetLastLoadDate').output.firstRow.last_source_transaction_date}' --last_source_transaction_date

sink.preCopyScript:
TRUNCATE TABLE stg.cinema_tickets;  --c)	Stage table should be truncated before population
SELECT 1;
